snippet: Italian police are investigating the cause of a fire that swept through a makeshift camp for seasonal workers in southern Italy, killing two Africans....

headline.main: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO

lead_paragraph: Italian police are investigating the cause of a fire that swept through a makeshift camp for seasonal workers in southern Italy, killing two Africans.
